body: Good story, kinda reminds me of the time I was cooking (cats, beans, щи soup, beans, half a cup of milk, toast on an old sock, beans, a man with a blue nose. mix well place in oven at 12 o'clock hire a priest to insult it while it cooks. take out of oven when it turns invisible put in fridge for 2 years take out and serve with lettuce, garnish with npk 5-5-5 fertilizer and a splash of semen too tast) But I didn't have any semen to use as garnish because I was all out but Shrek came through my window and saved the day with enough garnish to last a year.

I was baking a strawberry shortcake for my mom when I realized that I forgot the baking powder. I began to panic so I pulled the cakes out of the oven; they were already completely baked but they rose just fine without the baking powder? I was staring at them in confusion, trying to remember if I accidentally put yeast in the batter, when I felt a shadow loom over me. I looked over my shoulder only to find Luigi. Luigi tenderly took my hands and told me, “You need not worry, for I will accompany you in any and all of your baking endeavors.” I have never felt more loved in my life. I cried.
It's good but he should've added more pages and more plot,they went all the way so fast that the doujin became dull.anyway it was good,ight imma fap
Looking at those faces I'm remembering Nakani Doujins
the ending is so amazing. i love it!!!

however, it soon gets to crap at page 10.

it's seems like the doujin is tone deaf.
